analysis.description:
TokenERC20.minimumTokenThreshold (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#97-98) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- sendContractFundsToAddress (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#480-487)
	- returnEtherToInvestors (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#487-499)

TokenERC20.weekBonuses (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#112-113) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getWeekBonus (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#254-268)

TokenERC20 (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#5-499) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#411-419)
investorNumber in TokenERC20.returnEtherToInvestors (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol) is a local variable never initialiazed

TokenERC20.returnEtherToInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- investor.transfer(amountToSend) (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol)

TokenERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#66-67)
TokenERC20.fundsWithdrawnByOwners should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#105-106)
TokenERC20.minimumTokenThreshold should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#97-98)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_requireAuthorisation' of TokenERC20.setRequireAuthorisation (/unique_chucks/17/0xd70e66775a74a9aedeac6e28313e1033cd726552.sol#55) is not in mixedCase
